string.text: 強化型サージ再生機

このスーツのユニークなところは、周囲の電気エネルギーを吸収して部分的に体に変換し、耐久性を高める装置だ。過剰なエネルギーは損傷した組織の再生につながる。主に衝撃電流に対する過電圧保護として機能し、本体に接触する電気量を制限します。貴重な無線コンポーネントで構成された複雑な電子回路を表し、ボディの電気抵抗が大幅に増加します。その結果、人体はより低い電圧にさらされ、以前は死に至った電気の放電に耐えることができるようになります。したがって、電気の異常または他の電源に近づく必要がある場合には、電流制限マイクロリアクターを有することが極めて重要である。他のスーツと同様に、修復材料としても使用できます。
 
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] 技術品
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] スタック可能
改良されたアルミニウムフレーム

肩ひもで固定されたバックパックを背負うだけではなく、背広にアルミフレームで取り付けることができるので、持ち運び能力が最適化される。これらの改良されたフレームは、軽量化のための材料であるアルミニウムで作られており、また、スプリント中に柔軟性を得るためにプラスチックで作られている。全体の構造は、高度な調節をするための、ストラップおよびウエビングのシステムを備えている。肩ひもを上下に調節できる仕様になっているので、体のサイズに関係なく快適に着用できます。1セットのフレームがバックパックのメインフレームの代わりになるだけですが、より多くのフレームを使用して、持ち運び能力をさらに向上させることができます。このシステムは軽量アルミニウムでできているが、一部の部品はちょっとした修理にも使える。
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] 日用品
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] スタック可能
改良型チタンバックパックフレーム

Instead of simply carrying a backpack secured by a pair of shoulder straps, one can attach it to the suit by means of a titanium grid, which optimises your carrying capabilities. The improved grid is made of titanium which is the material of choice due to its light weight and high durability, and some external elements are made of plastic in order to attain desired flexibility while sprinting. The whole construction is equipped with a system of straps and webbing to provide a high degree of adjustability. This quality design allows the shoulder straps to be adjusted up or down so as to make wearing a backpack comfortable regardless of one's torso size. A single grid replaces only the main framework of your backpack, but it's possible to use more grids to further improve your carrying capabilities. Grids are created from very high quality titanium, thus disassembled grid can be used as an effective combat outfit or helmet repair supplement.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
改良型フロン発生器

改良されたフロン放出モジュールは、体の周囲を摂氏20度の一定温度に保つように設計されている。従って、高熱化の熱源から保護を必要とする状況において熱の影響を最小にするために、これは極めて有用である。それは、フロン冷却された空気粒子の厚い層を放出し、それは、いかなる過剰な熱も吸収し、着用者の周りの温度をわずかに低下させる微小な真空を生成する。フロンモジュールのもう一つの特徴は、適度な抵抗力です。
 
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] 技術品
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] スタック可能\n
改良型ボディクーラー

The improved body cooler is an electric module designed to maintain a constant temperature around the body at the level of 14 degrees Celsius. It is thus extremely useful in order to minimise the effects of extreme heat in situations requiring additional protection. It emits quick electrical impulses which produce a miniscule vacuum absorbing any excess heat and slightly decreasing the temperature around the user. It does not require water to function. Another feature of the body cooler is its ability to resist electricity to a moderate extent. In case of disassembly of the unit using a toolkit, the metal casing can be reused as outfit repair material.
 
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Improved kevlar plates and attachments

Kevlar plates are widely known for their protective capabilities, and are highly valued because of this feature. They perform a wide variety of functions, the most important of which is absorbing the impact of firearm projectiles on the front and the back of the torso. They constitute a lightweight alternative to heavy steel plates. Additionally, any type of armour plating also helps maintain suits in good condition, preventing degradation through wear and tear. Used by military units the world over.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] 30 sheets of kevlar
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] eq. of single grade III armour layer
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
改良型カーボン・スチールプレート

These steel plates are specially crafted, heat treated and shaped for ballistic defeating properties, fitting a wide variety of protective applications. They are designed to withstand smaller ballistic impacts on the front and the back of the torso. This protection, however, comes at a price as the thick steel plates are very heavy, thus limiting freedom of movement. Additionally, any type of armour plating also helps maintain suits in good condition, preventing degradation through wear and tear. Used extensively by Spetsnaz forces.
 
%c[d_red]

%c[d_red]WARNING:%c[ui_gray_2]
 
%c[default]Steel is a conductor and its proximity to the skin makes the body more vulnerable to electricity. For this reason, it is suggested to proceed with caution when near electrical anomalies or other sources of electricity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] single layer of steel plate
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
強化された水分補給バック

Borrowing its name from the myth that camels store water in their humps, camelbak is a pack worn on the back or around the waist of the user, containing a bladder that is filled with water to keep one hydrated. Flexible tube with a mouthpiece facilitates use even in most pressing situations. This model is camouflaged and integrated in the suit to protect the system from damage from any source, be it combat or anomaly. Because the container is made of a high-quality textile, experienced stalkers sometimes re-use scrapped camelbaks for quality materials to patch their field outfits.
 
%c[d_red]

%c[d_red]WARNING:%c[ui_gray_2]
 
%c[default]Although water has low electrical conductivity, its proximity to the body may make you more vulnerable to electrical currents. For this reason, it is recommended to take special notice of your surroundings when in possession of a camelbak.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
サージ防護装置

A small albeit advanced device that absorbs electrical energy from its closest surroundings. It serves as a protection of sorts as it limits the amount of electricity that comes into direct contact with the body by either blocking it or by shorting it to ground. As it is in fact a very sophisticated resistor circuit, the Surge Suppressor greatly increases electrical resistance of the body. The result is that the user is hit by a significantly lower voltage and is able to survive outbursts which would normally be lethal. It is thus of vital importance to have a surge suppressor on your belt when in proximity of electrical anomalies and other sources of electricity in the Zone. As with all metal objects, it can be used as a source of repair material as long as one has appropriate tools and enough skill.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
アルミ製フレーム

ショルダーストラップで固定されたバックパックを単に運ぶ代わりに、持ち運び能力を最適化するアルミニウムフレームを介してスーツに取り付けることができます。フレームは軽量で最適なアルミニウム製です。全体にストラップとウェビングのシステムが装備されており、細かな調整が可能です。この高品質のデザインにより、ショルダーストラップを調整できます。これ単体ではバックパックのメインフレームのみを置き換えますが、より多くのセットを使用して持ち運び能力をさらに向上させることができます。アルミニウムの一部は軽装甲の修理に役立つことが証明されています。 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] 日用品
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] 効果は重複します. 複数装備可能
チタンバックパックフレーム

Instead of simply carrying a backpack secured by a pair of shoulder straps, one can attach it to the suit by means of titanium grid, which optimises your carrying capabilities. The grid is made of titanium which is the material of choice due to its light weight and high durability, and some external elements are made of plastic in order to attain desired flexibility while sprinting. The whole construction is equipped with a system of straps and webbing to provide a high degree of adjustability. This quality design allows the shoulder straps to be adjusted up or down so as to make wearing a backpack comfortable regardless of one's torso size. A single grid replaces only the main framework of your backpack, but it's possible to use more grids to further improve your carrying capabilities. Grids are created from very high quality titanium, thus disassembled grid can be used as an effective combat outfit or helmet repair supplement.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
フロン発生器

The freon emission module is designed to maintain a constant temperature around the body at the level of 24 degrees Celsius. It is thus extremely useful in order to minimise the effects of extreme heat in situations requiring additional protection. It emits a thick layer of freon-cooled air particles which produce a miniscule vacuum absorbing any excess heat and slightly decreasing the temperature around the user. Another feature of the freon emission module is its ability to resist electricity to a moderate extent.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
ボディクーラー

The body cooler is an electric module designed to maintain a constant temperature around the body at the level of 18 degrees Celsius. It is thus extremely useful in order to minimise the effects of extreme heat in situations requiring additional protection. It emits quick electrical impulses which produce a miniscule vacuum absorbing any excess heat and slightly decreasing the temperature around the user. It does not require water to function. Another feature of the body cooler is its ability to resist electricity to a moderate extent. In case of disassembly of the unit using a toolkit, the metal casing can be reused as outfit repair material.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
ケブラー製プレートとアタッチメント

Kevlar plates are widely known for their protective capabilities, and are highly valued because of this feature. They perform a wide variety of functions, the most important of which is absorbing the impact of firearm projectiles on the front and the back of the torso. They constitute a lightweight alternative to heavy steel plates. Additionally, any type of armour plating also helps maintain suits in good condition, preventing degradation through wear and tear. Used by military units the world over.

 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] eq. of single grade IIA armour layer
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
カーボン・スチールプレート

These steel plates are specially crafted, heat treated and shaped for ballistic defeating properties, fitting a wide variety of protective applications. They are designed to withstand smaller ballistic impacts on the front and the back of the torso. This protection, however, comes at a price as the thick steel plates are very heavy, thus limiting freedom of movement. Additionally, any type of armour plating also helps maintain suits in good condition, preventing degradation through wear and tear. Used extensively by Spetsnaz forces.
 
%c[d_red]

%c[d_red]WARNING:%c[ui_gray_2]
 
%c[default]Steel is a conductor and its proximity to the skin makes the body more vulnerable to electricity. For this reason, it is suggested to proceed with caution when near electrical anomalies or other sources of electricity.

 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] single layer of steel plate 
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
キャメルバック

Borrowing its name from the myth that camels store water in their humps, camelbak is a pack worn on the back or around the waist of the user, containing a bladder that is filled with water to keep one hydrated. Flexible tube with a mouthpiece facilitates use even in most pressing situations. This model is camouflaged and integrated in the suit to protect the system from damage from any source, be it combat or anomaly. Because the container is made of a high-quality textile, experienced stalkers sometimes re-use scrapped camelbaks for quality materials to patch their field outfits.
 
%c[d_red]

%c[d_red]WARNING:%c[ui_gray_2]
 
%c[default]Although water has low electrical conductivity, its proximity to the body may make you more vulnerable to electrical currents. For this reason, it is recommended to take special notice of your surroundings when in possession of a camelbak.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
簡易アプリケーション・モジュール/IAM (空)

The Improvised Application Module (IAM) filters a small amount of radiation particles emitted from artefacts. This mechanical metal pouch is the cheapest device that allows the user to harness the power of less potent artefacts. Artefact filter is composed of multiple layers made primarily of lead which shield from radiation. A low-cost alternative to the more reliable AAC and AAM. In case of emergency or if no longer needed, the module can be utilised as a source of quality metal for use in outfit or helmet repairs. Currently unusable. To attach it to the belt, you have to put an artefact inside. The artefact will retain its characteristics with the exception of reduced radiation output.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] artefact storage device
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] maximum capacity:%c[ui_gray_1] 1
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] permissible radiation level:%c[ui_gray_1] 7 mSv
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] state:%c[ui_gray_1] empty
アーティファクト・アプリケーションコンテナ/AAC (空)

The Artefact Application Container (AAC) filters a moderate amount of radiation particles emitted from artefacts. This mechanical aluminium container is the most cost-efficient and thus the most popular way of handling artefacts as it allows the user to harness the power of more potent artefacts. Artefact filter is composed of multiple layers made primarily of lead, with one layer of thorium which has strong radiation shielding properties. This device has been manufactured by scientists residing in military bunkers around the Zone. In case of emergency or if no longer needed, the module can be utilised as a source of quality metal for use in outfit or helmet repairs. Currently unusable. To attach it to the belt, you have to put an artefact inside. The artefact will retain its characteristics with the exception of reduced radiation output.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] artefact storage device
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] maximum capacity:%c[ui_gray_1] 1
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] permissible radiation level:%c[ui_gray_1] 12 mSv
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] state:%c[ui_gray_1] empty
アーティファクト・アプリケーションモジュール/AAM (空)

The Artefact Application Module (AAM) filters a significant amount of radiation particles emitted from artefacts. This advanced mechanical module is the most effective way of harnessing the power of most potent artefacts. Artefact filter is composed of numerous layers made of nano-carbon. It is hence lightweight and has strongest radiation shielding properties of all devices. Regarded as a symbol of affluence in the Zone. Most commonly used by the scientists to minimise the harmful effects of artefacts. Designed and manufactured in Ukraine by a government institute which provides equipment for the scientists residing in the Zone of Alienation. In case of emergency or if no longer needed, the module can be utilised as a source of quality metal for use in outfit or helmet repairs. Currently unusable. To attach it to the belt, you have to put an artefact inside. The artefact will retain its characteristics with the exception of reduced radiation output.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] artefact storage device
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] maximum capacity:%c[ui_gray_1] 1
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] permissible radiation level:%c[ui_gray_1] 23 mSv
 %c[ui_white] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] state:%c[ui_gray_1] empty
Fleshの皮

Hide removed from a breed of mutated pigs commonly referred to as fleshes. Its heavy weight (its main drawback) results from a thick layer of fat underneath the relatively soft and shallow skin. It offers low physical protection, but on the other hand considerably reduces the harmful effects of chemical, thermal and electrical anomalies. Can be used only for minor repairs as the layer of fat is useless for the purposes of armour maintenance and must be cut off, leaving only a small patch of shallow skin tissue.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] light mutant pelt
%c[d_purple] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] damage prot. negligible
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Boarの皮

A hide almost fully covered with a thick layer of fur, removed from one of wild boars found commonly in the Zone. The mutants themselves are quite resistant to damage and can take considerable punishment, and the reason for this is simple: big muscle mass and almost unbreakable bones. The skin, on the other hand, is quite thin (most probably to provide the creature with effective means of thermal regulation), making it a rather poor choice for armour enhancement. The fur in turn makes the hide a relatively potent thermal insulator. Can also be used for light repairs. Unfortunately, wearing the pelt on top of the armour makes the user less resistant to radioactive and toxic damage as heavy particles often accumulate within the fur.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] light mutant pelt 
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Bloodsucker の皮膚

Bloodsuckers as a species evolved from humans and this affinity can still be seen in the texture of their skin. What is most characteristic, the skin is very soft and pleasant in touch, almost like the skin of a child. This applies, however, only to the outer layer - underneath, bloodsuckers boast well-developed muscles which can be utilised to form a coat of sorts with considerable damage reducing potential, especially in regard to melee attacks. This makes bloodsucker skin a popular choice among experienced hunters who also wear it as a sign of their proficiency. The most unique property and at the same time the main drawback of the skin is its very intense reaction to temperature change - although the tissue itself will only burn in very high temperatures, it can get very hot making it increasingly damaging to wearer and equipment underneath it.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] medium mutant pelt
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] valuable 
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Psysuckerの皮

Psysuckers as a species evolved from bloodsuckers and this affinity can still be seen in the texture of their skin. What is most characteristic, the skin is very soft and pleasant in touch, almost like the skin of a child. This applies, however, only to the outer layer - underneath, Psysuckers boast well-developed muscles which can be utilised to form a coat of sorts with considerable damage reducing potential, especially in regard to melee attacks. This makes Psysucker skin a popular choice among experienced hunters who also wear it as a sign of their proficiency. The most unique property and at the same time the main drawback of the skin is its very intense reaction to temperature change - although the tissue itself will only burn in very high temperatures, it can get very hot making it increasingly damaging to wearer and equipment underneath it. Reports indicate that whereas the skin offers relatively low physical protection it can be used to absorb and disperse significant amounts of incoming psy waves when worn over the head.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] medium mutant pelt
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] valuable 
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Lurkerの皮

A thick hide almost fully covered with a layer of fur, removed from a lurker. The mutants themselves are quite resistant to damage and can take considerable punishment, and the reason for this is simple: big muscle mass and almost unbreakable bones. The skin of lurker is known for being thick and durable, making it a good choice for armour enhancement. The fur in turn makes the hide a relatively potent thermal insulator. Can also be used for light repairs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] light mutant pelt 
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Burer の皮膚

Skinning a burer is a lot like skinning a twisted dwarf. Add to it an almost unbearable stench of bad eggs and you get the idea why stalkers consider this quite a feat. Reports indicate that whereas the skin offers relatively low physical protection it can be used to absorb and disperse significant amounts of incoming psy waves when worn over the head. Burer's skin has low electrical resistance, thus the wearer is more susceptible to electrical damage. Furthermore, due to the fact that burers are relatively rarely encountered in the Zone, the skin has significant research potential, making it a valuable trading commodity for the scientists.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] light mutant pelt
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Chimeraの皮

Chimera, being one of the most dangerous mutants in the Zone, is not only a significant threat, but can also be regarded as a viable source of wealth. All parts that can be taken from chimera's corpse can be sold for a large amount of money, but it is the skin that is one of the most valued scientific specimens as well as one of the best armour enhancements available in the Exclusion Zone. It offers very good protection properties and, even more importantly, is relatively light-weight thanks to which it does not limit mobility. However, its most unique feature is that organic fibres found in the skin act as very effective electrical conductors. This fact to a large degree confirms reports of recon units (especially those scouting around the AMK Industrial Complex) concerning sightings of chimeras surrounded in what looked like an electrical anomaly, producing discharges on contact with any hostile living organism. Unfortunately, no unit was able to make it back, so there is no evidence confirming the existence of such a creature.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] heavy mutant pelt
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] very rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] extremely valuable
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Pseudogiantの皮

The skin of a pseudogiant in many ways resembles the skin of an elephant. It's thick and hard in touch, its texture is very irregular and full of folds which act as the creature's cooling mechanism. The average thickness of pseudogiant's skin is around 2 cm, which makes it very durable and capable of withstanding significant damage. This is, however, at the cost of increased weight. Since pseudogiants are known to often live in areas of high toxicity and radioactivity, the hide naturally adapted to such conditions, which further increases its usefulness. It can also be used to patch even the heaviest of outfits but this process requires the most durable and expensive tools available. It is valued not only for its practical qualities, but can also serve as a prestigious hunting trophy and a rare specimen for the scientists in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] very heavy mutant pelt
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Controllerの頭皮

As is the case with other humanoid mutants, it's quite an emotional challenge to scalp a controller and it proves to be even more difficult as the face of a controller retains certain characteristics of the person it once was. Confidential sources within the military also revealed that fingerprints of the person who turned into a controller can sometimes be found in the database. Recent analysis shows that not only the hand of the controller is capable of producing psy waves - the whole body is the source of emissions. For this reason, the scalp - when prepared properly - has the ability to absorb and filter psy energy, but for this effect to take place it is necessary to cover your head with multiple scalps. The skin is also electrically conductive. As regards its physical properties, it is light and can only be used for minor outfit repairs. As is the case with all humanoid psy creatures, the skin of a controller is electrically conductive.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] light mutant pelt
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] rare scientific specimen
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] very valuable
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Pseudodogの毛皮

Densely covered with short and stiff fur, the pelt of pseudodog remains one of the most useful, widespread and versatile mutant pelts available in the Zone. It can be easily attached to armour with even lightest of tools, and yet it's quite durable, which makes it suitable for medium-grade outfit repairs. When used as a whole - it can cover significant area of the body with protective layer which increases resistance to both physical damage and heat. The fur also provides effective insulation. However, as is the case with all such pelts, it easily catches radioactive and toxic particles, so it is highly advised to remove it when in radioactive or toxic areas.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] medium mutant pelt
 %c[d_cyan] пїЅ %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable
Psy-dogの毛皮

The fur of a psy dog is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful and rare clothing materials in the world. Usually snow white or grey, it is in great demand and can be sold for a hefty sum of money. It's probably made its way into fashion industry thanks to smugglers some of whom have recently turned to hunting mutants. For those in the Zone, it can serve as a blanket, especially during cold nights, and offers efficient rupture protection and mild psy influence reduction when head part of the fur is used as a mask or a hood. However, it easily catches radioactive and toxic particles, so it is highly advised to remove it when in radioactive or toxic areas. Hunters wear it with pride, but only if the creature was slain by their own hands.

粉末ダイヤモンド

"Diamond powder" is a common name given to crystal-like substance sometimes found in the belly of all species of psy creatures. It is not known what metabolic processes lead to its emergence and for this reason scientists are eager to pay large sums of money to lay their hands on it. Practical use is limited but some stalkers are known to sprinkle their most cherished hunting knives with it as it makes sharpening significantly easier. It also makes blades look shiny and well-kept.
